s: The heat rivals regular Tabasco brand pepper sauce, but, in my opinion, has a smoother, richer pepper flavor, and is less vinegary. Tastes great on many kinds of cajun, creole, and southern dishes. ... Although I am a fan of spicy foods, I never quite liked hot sauce. Most I had tried before were overpowering, had too much fire or too much vinegar. Not Louisiana Gold...
